dynamic-element.name: roleOverview
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: See the future of eyewear through code! Clarity, a leading global manufacturer of innovative eyewear, seeks a passionate Senior Web Developer to join our dynamic team. In this key role, you'll play a vital role in crafting exceptional user experiences across our web platforms, from our e-commerce store to our brand storytelling website. You'll leverage your web development expertise to build, maintain, and enhance our digital presence, ensuring a seamless and visually appealing experience for our customers.

dynamic-element.name: keyResposabilities
dynamic-element.dynamic-content:
• Collaborate with designers, product managers, and marketing teams to translate concepts into user-friendly and visually stunning web interfaces.
  • Develop and implement clean, maintainable, and efficient code using industry-standard web development technologies (e.g., HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript frameworks).
  • Build reusable UI components and ensure consistent brand identity across all web platforms.
  • Optimize website performance for speed and responsiveness across various devices (desktop, mobile, tablet).
  • Implement best practices for website security and accessibility.
  • Utilize content management systems (CMS) to manage website content efficiently.
  • Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure website functionality and identify and resolve technical issues.
  • Stay up-to-date on the latest web development trends and technologies, and continuously seek opportunities to improve our web presence.
  • Document code effectively to ensure clear communication and maintainability.

dynamic-element.name: qualificationAndSkills
dynamic-element.dynamic-content:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (preferred).
  • Minimum 5+ years of experience as a web developer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
  • Proven experience with front-end and back-end web development technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript frameworks).
  • Experience with content management systems (CMS) (a plus).
  • Excellent understanding of web design principles and user experience (UX) best practices.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills with the ability to identify and resolve technical challenges.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
  • A passion for building user-friendly and visually appealing web experiences.
  • A commitment to continuous learning and staying current with the latest web development trends.
